entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this evening and before morning. Wind south 20 km/h becoming west 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early in the morning. Clearing late in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 30 after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
